data.name: No Straight Roads Original Soundtrack
data.detailed_description:
It's ROCK vs. EDM in the killer original soundtrack for NO STRAIGHT ROADS!

The NO STRAIGHT ROADS Original Soundtrack is composed by James Landino, Funk Fiction, Falk Au Yeong, and Andy Tunstall. Featuring an incredible lineup of guest compositions, arrangements and performances by Masahiro "Godspeed" Aoki, RoboRob, Tokyo Machine, Shota Nakama, Nikki Simmons, Ai Yamamoto, Az Samad, Clyde Rabatel Zapata, and Tony Ann.
data.about_the_game:

data.short_description: The killer original soundtrack for NO STRAIGHT ROADS!
data.reviews:
“The soundtrack alone, which should be a shoo-in for 2020’s games awards, could well be considered a classic in future”
Forbes

“absolutely excellent music”
Gamespot
